weapon_description:
A heavy blade that people claim was beloved by the hero known as the Firethief. They say that even the Lord of Cinder Keep's flames could not
burn it away.
weapon_skill_description: After a party member triggers a Pyro-related reaction, the equipping character's Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 32% for 8s. This effect can be triggered even when the triggering party member is not on the field.
